description: Starling Properties is delighted to offer this two-bedroom apartment in Noura Tower in Al Habtoor City, located in Business Bay.    Features/ Amenities:  - 2 Bedrooms  - 3 Bathrooms  - BUA: 1,511 sq. ft.  - Built-in Wardrobe - Laundry room  - Unique unit  - High quality furniture and amazing views  - Floor to ceiling windows  - Gym and Spa  - Yoga, Pilates and Aerobics Studio  - Swimming pool  - Barbeque area  - Allocated parking space  - Landscaped gardens  - 24 hour security  - Landlord will pay service fees for the year upfront     Reference: CrB039   Noora, also referred to as Noora Tower, is one of the three residential skyscrapers in The Residences Collection, Al Habtoor City. description: Discover refined living in this upgraded, extended 4-bedroom villa nestled within the exclusive Jumeirah Luxury community at Jumeirah Golf Estates. Embrace the epitome of luxury living and make this exquisite villa your new home.

description: AX CAPITAL Real Estate is offering to the market this elegant, spacious, and fully equipped 1-bedroom apartment in Princess Tower Marina.  PROPERTY FEATURES: - Fully Upgraded - Spacious - Huge Balcony - Fully Furnished - High floor - Freshly maintained - Built-in wardrobes - Near Tram Station - BUA: 861.65 sq ft - Designated parking space AMENITIES: - 24-Hour security - Temperature-controlled swimming pool and jacuzzi - Health club - Gym and fitness facilities  - Car parking - High-speed elevators NEARBY AMENITIES: - Metro Station, Tram, and Bus Station  - Shopping Malls - Supermarkets  - Hospitals  - Clinics - Reference No. axc View Contact Detail ABOUT Princess Tower: At 414 meters the Princess Tower holds the world record for the world's tallest residential building. It is roughly equivalent in height to the Empire State Building in New York. It was originally to be named Al Ameera Tower but the English translation, Princess Tower, was chosen instead.   Princess Tower was originally planned to be just 90 stories and the height was purely a means to maximize the profit on a relatively small plot of land. It was only later into the design process that the developers realized a potential word record was within reach, so the tower was re-designed at the last minute to allow for a further 11 floors.  The tower is positioned slightly closer to the sea than its direct neighbors. That was done to maximize the sea views for the side apartments and explains why it appears off-center on its podium.  AX CAPITAL was built upon a desire to create a real estate agency of the modern era where the customer is central to everything we do. With our values clearly defined, we are committed to continuously evolving as a real estate agency and it is this passion and dedication that marks the foundation of AX CAPITAL and makes us different. description: Immerse yourself in the tranquil luxury of this exclusive 5-bedroom residence nestled in the heart of Arabian Ranches, one of Dubai’s most sought-after communities. This beautifully crafted home boasts a sprawling layout that combines elegance with functionality, making it a perfect sanctuary for those who appreciate privacy and refined living.  As you step inside, you are greeted by a grand foyer that leads seamlessly into the spacious living areas. Each room is bathed in natural light, enhancing the meticulously chosen finishes and modern aesthetics. The living room, with its large windows, offers breathtaking views of the lush surroundings and seamlessly transitions into a formal dining area, ideal for entertaining guests.  Upstairs, the master suite is a true retreat, featuring a luxurious en-suite bathroom with dual vanities, a soaking tub, and a separate shower. The additional bedrooms are generously sized, each with its own unique charm and built-in wardrobes, providing plenty of space for family and guests.  Outside, the property unfolds into a beautiful garden that serves as a peaceful haven, ideal for relaxation or hosting gatherings. The outdoor area is complemented by a stunning terrace that offers amazing views of the Arabian Ranches community, providing a perfect backdrop for serene evenings and joyful celebrations.  This home not only offers a vast interior space but also ensures privacy and security within a prestigious neighborhood. Residents can enjoy access to a range of community amenities such as parks, swimming pools, and walking trails, all contributing to a lifestyle marked by luxury and comfort.  Experience the pinnacle of suburban living in this magnificent 5-bedroom home, where every detail has been carefully curated to offer an unparalleled living experience in Arabian Ranches.
